caption: The video starts with a person attempting to pilot a spaceship to take off, while soldiers try to stop him unsuccessfully. He ultimately succeeds in launching and lands on an unknown planet. At that moment, his spacecraft is hijacked by a group of mysterious individuals. It's thanks to a local who assists him that he avoids being discovered by this group. He learns that these mysterious individuals come from a much larger spacecraft and seem to have malevolent intentions. Fortunately, a local finds him and reveals the truth about the situation, after which they return together to the local base.

global.question: When does the things in the video happens, ancient age, modern age or future?(Does the technology exists on earth?)

Is there more than five different characters appear(not including people in the background)?
what time does the video take place?(at day time or night time?)
global.answer: Both at day time and at night time.

breakpoint.answer: A space ship is flying over the sun.
